summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 50 of the former City of Georgetown, for the improvement of Colorado Avenue and Howard Street, in the former City of Georgetown, now the City of Seattle, by sidewalking the same between a point 50 feet east of the east line of Bishop Street and Junction Street, under Ordinance No. 530 of the former City of Georgetown, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
